question: What has been the market reaction to Mastercard's most recent earnings beat?
result_lines: Our strong performance over the years has resulted in substantial stock price appreciation.
Comparison of cumulative five-year total return*
translated_lines: 수년간의 강력한 실적은 주가의 상당한 상승으로 이어졌습니다.
chunk:
# Our performance The following are our key financial and operational highlights for 2022, including growth rates over the prior year:
GAAP
Net revenue $22.2BNet income $9.9BDiluted EPS $10.22
up 18%up 14%up 17%
NON-GAAP 1 (currency-neutral)
Adjusted net revenue $22.2BAdjusted net income $10.3BAdjusted diluted EPS $10.65
up 23%up 32%up 34%
Gross dollar volume (growth on a local currency basis) $8.2T up 12% Cross-border volume growth (on a local currency basis) up 45% Switched transactions 125.7B up 12% Our strong performance over the years has resulted in substantial stock price appreciation. Comparison of cumulative five-year total return* 1 Non-GAAP results (including growth rates) exclude the impact of gains and losses on equity investments, Special Items and/or foreign currency. Refer to Appendix A for the reconciliation to the most direct comparable GAAP financial measures and our reasons for presenting them.
